comment.author: 12853714@N08
comment._content: Looks like a sedge (Cyperaceae) rather than a grass (Poaceae).

comment.author: 81034794@N03
comment._content: This is Cyperaceae: Cyperus odoratus L.

comment.author: 25053835@N03
comment._content:
Thank you, DCTropics and sedge_man!  It's great to get more information on these.  We've asked our Smithsonian botanists to take a look and perhaps we'll be able to update this record.

All the best,
Carolyn Sheffield
Field Book Project
